name: hmopex

body.origin:
|- wcel(cho, universe)
-| wcel(co(chba, cmap, chba), universe)
-| wss(cho, co(chba, cmap, chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cho, universe)
-| wcel(co(chba, cmap, chba), universe)
-| wss(cho, co(chba, cmap, chba))

|- wcel(cho, universe)
-| wss(cho, co(chba, cmap, chba))

body.origin:
|- wss(cho, co(chba, cmap, chba))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cho), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, chba)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cho)
-| diffsc(hs0, co(chba, cmap, chba))
body.pretty:
⊢ HrmOp ⊆(~H[↦]~H)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ HrmOp → hs0 ∈(~H[↦]~H))
⊣ d(hs0, HrmOp)
⊣ d(hs0,(~H[↦]~H))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cho, universe)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cho), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, chba)))

-| diffsc(hs0, co(chba, cmap, chba))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ HrmOp ∈ 𝕌
⊣ (hs0 ∈ HrmOp → hs0 ∈(~H[↦]~H))
⊣ d(hs0, HrmOp)
⊣ d(hs0,(~H[↦]~H))

stmt.origin: sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cho), wcel(cv(hs0), co(chba, cmap, chba)), wf(cv(hs0), chba, chba))
